allow:
Bash(python -c "
import re

# Read the file
with open\(''ath-booking.py'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

# Count total print statements
print_count = len\(re.findall\(r''\\bprint\\\('', content\)\)
print\(f''Total print\(\) calls found: {print_count}''\)

# Patterns that indicate ERROR level
error_patterns = [
    r''ERROR'', r''Error'', r''error'',
    r''FAILED'', r''Failed'', r''failed'',
    r''Could not'', r''could not'',
    r''Cannot'', r''cannot'',
    r''Invalid'', r''invalid'',
    r''Missing'', r''missing''
]

# Count how many would be ERROR vs INFO
error_count = 0
info_count = 0

for match in re.finditer\(r''print\\\([^\)]+\\\)'', content\):
    print_content = match.group\(0\)
    is_error = any\(re.search\(pattern, print_content\) for pattern in error_patterns\)
    if is_error:
        error_count += 1
    else:
        info_count += 1

print\(f''Would convert to ERROR: {error_count}''\)
print\(f''Would convert to INFO: {info_count}''\)
")
